product_name: Sunlite Hard Shell Deluxe Tot Bike Trailer - Double - 2013 Overstock
long_description: A 2-child trailer with a durable steel floor that converts to a cargo hauler for touring, the Sunlite Hard Shell Deluxe Tot Bike Trailer makes it easy to take 2 kids along for the ride. Built-in adjustable seat accommodates 1 or 2 children and has a maximum capacity of 100 lbs., and trailer converts to a cargo hauler with included side rails when ride is over. Durable 600-denier polyester material features a roll-up weather window. Axle-mount system; side bump guards; reflective materials; safety flag. Overstock.
short_description: A 2-child trailer with a durable steel floor that converts to a cargo hauler for touring, the Sunlite Hard Shell Deluxe Tot Bike Trailer makes it easy to take 2 kids along for the ride.
